The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

'''''The Silmarillion Calendar 1978''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] in [[1977]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] based on ''[[The Silmarillion]]'', with commentary by [[Christopher Tolkien]].
==Contents==

* Cover - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Luthien Heraldic Device II.jpg|Lúthien Tinúviel]]"
* January - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Gondolin and the Vale of Tumladen (Colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|Gondolin and the Vale of Tumladen]]" <ref group="note" name="Rid"/>
* February - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Lake_Mithrim.jpg|Lake Mithrim]] and Heraldic Devices" ([[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Fëanor heraldic device.jpg|Fëanor]], [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Fingolfin heraldic device.jpg|Fingolfin]], [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Hador heraldic device.jpg|Hador]], [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Earendil's Heraldic Device.JPG|Eärendil]])
* March - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Taniquetil.jpg|Taniquetil]]"
* April - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Heraldic Devices.jpg|Heraldic Devices]]"
* May - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Nargothrond (I).jpg|Nargothrond (I)]]"
* June - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Nargothrond (II) (Colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|Nargothrond (II)]]" <ref group="note" name="Rid">Coloured by [[H.E. Riddett]]</ref>
* July - "Númenórean Tile and Textiles" ([[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Tile 1.jpg|I]], [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Tile 2.jpg|II]], [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Tile 3.jpg|III]])
* August - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Fangorn Forest.jpg|Beleg finds Gwindor in Taur-nu-Fuin]]"
* September - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Tol Sirion (Colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|Tol Sirion]]" <ref group="note" name="Rid"/>
* October - "Elvish Script" ([[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Elvish script 1.jpg|I]], [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Elvish script 2.jpg|II]], [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Elvish script 3.jpg|III]])
* November - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Glórund sets forth to seek Túrin.jpg|Glaurung sets forth to seek Túrin]]"
* December - "[[:File:Christopher Tolkien - Map of Beleriand (colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|The Silmarillion Map]]" <ref group="note" name="Rid"/>

* "Notes on the Pictures" by [[Christopher Tolkien]]
